name: Templar Revenge
description:
Welcome to Templar Revenge!

You play as William,a templar who has left the army to avenge his father death.

You will have to go trough many worlds,enemies before you can face the King himself!Good luck fighters!

Game is still under development!

Game's Demo is obviously going to be free...as soon as open world is added base game will cost 9.99$,and all subsequent DLC's will be 4.99$.

DLC's are of course optional,as i am planning to add the ability to end the game right at the first world.If you want the full experience of getting to the king DLC's are recommended but not required.
